q: Which of the following is a data-storage component?
In big data, which of the following file formats is supported by Sqoop for import?
In Sqoop, which of the following arguments is used to specify the JDBC driver class manually?
Which of the following is not a key feature of Apache Sqoop?
Which of the following enables bidirectional data transfer between Hadoop and a relational database?
Which of the following arguments is used in Sqoop eval command to read the password from the console?

What is the purpose of the following argument in the Sqoop command:

--hive-delims-replacement

a.option: To replace all Hive delimiters with null.
To replace any Hive delimiters with string.
To replace \01, \n, and \t characters with null.
To replace \01, \n, and \t characters with any string.

q: Which of the following is correct about Sqoop import?

a.option: The argument --warehouse-dir use to specify a particular directory in HDFS.
The argument --target-dir use to specify the parent directory of all the sqoop jobs.
